articles.title: Italy beat England on penalties to clinch Euro title - SuperSport
articles.description: Italy beat England 3-2 on penalties after the Euro 2020 final ended 1-1 following extra time at Wembley on Sunday to secure their second European Championship title.

articles.author: Moohita Kaur Garg
articles.title: Defending Earth: Repurposing telecommunication satellites to protect Earth from asteroid collision - WION
articles.description: A recent study conducted by the European aerospace company Airbus suggests that when an asteroid is hurtling toward our planets, we could deploy large TV broadcasting satellites to deflect the space rock.
articles.content: A recent study conducted by the European aerospace company Airbus suggests that when an asteroid is hurtling toward our planets, we could deploy large TV broadcasting satellites to deflect the space … [+2769 chars]

articles.title: England fined 30000 euros for use of laser pointer, booing Denmark anthem - Reuters
articles.description: UEFA have fined England's Football Association (FA) 30,000 euros ($36,000) after a laser pointer was shone at Denmark goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel during what proved to be the deciding moment of their Euro 2020 semi-final, Europe's governing body said on Satu…
